veiled.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a veiled threat, warning, attack, reference etc is expressed so that its exact meaning is hidden or unclear
veiled.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: His speech is being seen as a veiled attack on asylum-seekers.
‘I’m impressed, ’ said Greg, with thinly veiled  (=only slightly hidden) sarcasm.
Jasper remained silent and his eyes were veiled  (=you could not guess what he was thinking).
